column1: Smoque BBQ////Two things to preface: 1) I love BBQ and
column3: have a pretty low threshold for a 5-star review; 2) My favorite BBQ in Chicago (and that of many other Yelpers) is Green Street Smoked Meats
column4: so I'm going to (potentially unfairly) write this review in this context. Overall
column5: Green Street has better sides and a better non-food experience; Smoque has better meat and better price points. But both are *amazing* and you cannot go wrong with either.
